website_summaries.verdict: A good style that fits in with a variety of interior decors. Easy to maintain and clean.
pros: Black fabric resists staining and messes for longer life
The chrome is easy to clean and polish
cons: Small bench space has enough room for only two people

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but not too comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This white bench is very pretty and modern looking. I gave it 4 star rating only because it’s not very comfortable to sit on. But looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Luu

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, great quality and took all but 5 minutes to assemble. All pieces ship separately, packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: KNangs6688

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I felt it was a little expensive but it is a great addition to my dining table. Love how the white and silver look together. The seat is nice, sturdy, and very comfortable. The reason why I thinks it’s a little overprice is because it seems that the cushion isn’t made out of good material and it seem that after some use it will get soft. It was delivered fast and came packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Molina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Just 4 screws via allen wrench on each side. soft fake leather. looks nice for price paid. padding is soft. matches with my existing dining set.
customer_reviews.author: gookie

customer_reviews.title: This bench is gorgeous and a perfect fit in our condo
customer_reviews.text: This bench is gorgeous and a perfect fit in our condo. The stitching can be cleaned up a bit, and the seat is a bit more on the firm side. But honestly for the price, no complaints. Arrived in 2 boxes: one box was the seat, the second box had the legs. Legs were easy to screw on.
customer_reviews.author: drahcir830_review

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I really want a refund or an amazon gift card because this was trash. Didn’t come with any screws, there’s a tear on one side and stiff as a rock. I had some extra screws from a previous project that used on this bench... once I put it together it was wobbly and uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench!
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect for my foyer and the quality good except for the holes for the legs didn't line up very well but I was able to force it together. As far as comfort, it's a little stiff but because I am using it for my foyer it works well. May not be the best for bedroom comfort? Very nice bench!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice bigger than I thought but still really nice
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love my bench. It looks so elegant and chick. It is more beautiful than how it looks in the picture. It is also so comfortable: helps me keep straight and well seated. Also, it was super well packaged and it was way easy to assemble. I am very pleased and happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bench! Easy to put together great quality and sturdy. Looks very modern and elegant. Definitely buy!
customer_reviews.author: debra B

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was sub par
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of furniture, but found the screws for the assembly were all over the package loosely, I am glad they did not fall out of the package. This is not the way to ship items.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Horse

customer_reviews.title: Stylish piece!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, well packed and easy to assemble. Needed this piece for compact living where I wouldn't have the back of the chairs in the way. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Y L

customer_reviews.title: Cream, Not Optic White
customer_reviews.text: This bench is not the optic white I was hoping for but it will work for now. It’s material is sort and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great syle and affordibility
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a sturdy, attractive, comfortable bench. It looks great and is the prefect size for my small office waiting room.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised; nice chrome finish and comfortable foam seating bench that will likely soften with use. Color is perfect. Highly recommended. Also arrived in sensible packaging with no damage except bolts were loose and not in their little pouch, which theoretically could have scratched the cushion. Minor point.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Solid Affordable Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little bench. We are using it in a small waiting area in our office. Assembly is simple. The bench is sturdy. It also looks great in our new office.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J Summers

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Modern bench. Nice quality and arrived on time. Easy to assemble. I use this with my modern dining table. Received lits of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: OBLAKS

customer_reviews.title: bench is the best
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bench. perfect size, very durable. I would buy it again. it is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Ella H.

customer_reviews.title: Classy piece of furniture of any contemporary setting.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move around as the crowd moved around. Favorite among young folks...great buy.
customer_reviews.author: VN

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect I like it . The description very easy to but it together I recommend the seller
customer_reviews.author: Ghada

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Well made, easy to assemble. I bought it to match the table in the picture. Love the table too. Great for small spaces. My three grandchildren can all sit together on the bench. Very roomy!
customer_reviews.author: THERESA M. DEAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bench to match my dinning chair, and surprisingly it is the exact same color and as the chairs. We use it daily and we havent had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived carefully packaged. Easy to assemble. We're using this as extra seating in a waiting area and it matched other furniture perfectly. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: HelpMeRonda

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate - great find!
customer_reviews.text: Great find! Easy to assemble, sturdy and comfortable. We had some missing hardware from a box damaged in shipping but they sent replacements next day. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for a cheaper bench and this one has help up nicely. Is bigger than I thought but that’s good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice modern bench!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice modern bench. Fits perfectly with my modern dining set (see pictures). Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe D

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive all the items. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item as I didn't get all of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the pic, very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Just as shown in the pic. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dylan L.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality !
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, only 2 months after purchase and it’s coming apart already and we don’t even use it more than once a week! And don’t have kids ! Will never purchase anything from this company again !
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N

customer_reviews.title: It goes well with my table
customer_reviews.text: It could be cheeper not so comfy but it's different. And I love it
customer_reviews.author: Juanita N.

customer_reviews.title: It just suits our modern style.
customer_reviews.text: Matches our table perfectly (black w/ chrome legs of same shape). Great extra seating especially for children as it cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with only 1 leg.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is nice. However, the bench arrived with only 1 leg, so disappointing. Unable to use bench as is. Will be returning the bench to seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lancia Darville

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my kitchen very easy to maintain and clean
customer_reviews.author: Dess

customer_reviews.title: Missing ALL the hardware!
customer_reviews.text: I got the bench and legs without any of the bolts to hold them together. Usually I wouldn’t make a big deal and just buy some replacement bolts but, when the table was shipped I was missing the table top, the legs, and the entire hardware kit. In addition to this, the sectional couch had 8 small cuts in it. I’m so disappointed with Armen Living and I will NEVER get anything else from them again! It’s just too much of an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: 1puppy & a headache

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble! Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This bench was very easy to assemble. It already comes with the tool to put the four screws in. Easy as pie!
customer_reviews.author: Shameka McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  bench for the money.  Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bench. Ordered Gray and it was a perfect match with gray dining chairs I have. The bench legs are perfect with the legs of the glass table. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah, Charlotte NC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! perfect size and very expensive look.
customer_reviews.text: great product! Easy to assemble, very Sturdy and perfect price point....it really looks expensive!
customer_reviews.author: A Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! Arrived damaged and parts (the legs of the bench) missing! Would give zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Gema Montana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very easy to assemble, and move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.text: I love how elegant it looks in my dinning room. Easy to assemble and pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, good quality , super easy to assembly! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Armen Living Amanda Bench in Black and Chrome Finish
product_meta.description: Color:Black Vinyl and Chrome FinishThe Armen Living Amanda contemporary bench is a beautiful piece sure to add extra style to any modern living room. The Amanda boasts sleek faux leather upholstery over a sturdy chrome metal frame. The Amanda's sleek metal legs assure durability without detracting from the style of the piece. The Amanda bench is ideal when paired with the Amanda dining table, corner sofa, and side chair. This piece is a unique and eye-catching bench that elevates any home style. This bench is crafted with the best materials for a high-quality, long-lasting bench you can display in your home. The Amanda can be used in multiple parts of the home and can serve both functional and decorative purposes. You can place this beautiful bench, in your bedroom, hallway, living room, den, or even in your home office. The Amanda bench is available in your choice of black, white, or grey. We stand by the quality, the craftsmanship, and the integrity of our product by offering a 1-year for all our products. Product Dimensions: 48"W x 18"D x 19"H
feature_bullets: Fill the void in your dining room with a self expressing feat of modern design
High quality vinyl is brilliantly accented by sturdy metal legs
Durable chrome metal construction is eye pleasing and functional
Padded seat is exceptionally comfortable and designed to seat up to three people
This sturdy dining bench can hold three people
Versatile style that can fit enhance the decor in any room of your house or office
Comes with clear instructions which creates an easy assembly experience

specifications.Manufacturer: LEGACY COMMERCIAL HOLDINGS INC ARMEN LIVING - DROP SHIP
